metadata.title: CVE-2020-19144 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via the 'in _TIFFmemcpy' funtion in the component 'tif_unix.c'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19144` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm2
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm2
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm2
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm2').
